column1: We kept the faith and now we have a new President-Elect to celebrate!   Wishing President-Elect @JoeBiden the happiest of birthdays today. Our country has a bright future ahead with you at the helm! https://t.co/NL57K0GQgB

Tonight I’m feeling so hopeful for this great country and for every person who calls it home.   Thank you to @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris their entire campaign and the tens of millions of supporters who have given us hope for a brighter future for all. https://t.co/K1SPVMcs2D
The sun may be setting in Wilmington but make no mistake: it’s morning in America. https://t.co/LeRZU2CTxl

Those of us in Delaware could not be prouder to send one of our own to the White House. But my friend @JoeBiden never thought that this campaign was about him. It was and always has been about the soul of America.  His compassion and decency will unite our country.

We will prioritize environmental justice.  We will fight for an economy that works for every American.  We will welcome strangers to our land and celebrate diversity.  We will restore our system of checks and balances.  We will protect the quality affordable health care.

.@JoeBiden and @SenKamalaHarris have been elected with a historic mandate. And as a result we finally have leaders who will fight for every American and unite this country be guided by science and who will prioritize facts over fiction.

We have as a country sent a clear message. We want change.  @JoeBiden has been elected with more votes than any candidate in our history -- over 73 million.   And finally the American people will be able to for the first time ever call a woman of color Madam Vice President!

Over the past four years ordinary Americans from all walks of life have taken it upon themselves to work for and fight for ‘a more perfect Union.’  A better democracy.   A brighter future.  Today's result makes it clear: We as a country want change and that change is @JoeBiden.

We've kept the faith. We've counted all the votes. And thanks to the hard work and contributions of so many we have a President-elect who respects our democracy as well as the voices of every person in that democracy.

Democracy isn’t fast and it isn't easy.  But democracy is certainly worth waiting and fighting for.   This week we've only seen one leader who has respected our democratic process who has reminded us to keep the faith and who has insisted that every vote be counted: @JoeBiden.
Faith: kept. History: made!   #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/2yxuAi9Md6
All aboard folks. Delaware is headed to the White House!  #BidenHarris2020 #TeamJoe https://t.co/2boBZY4EQY
This from a man who spent most of this year repeatedly urging his supporters NOT to vote by mail.  Completely baseless and irresponsible. https://t.co/x1wt71PRFu
I’m so proud to be on this team. https://t.co/BU8A8lj0B8

We take our history seriously here in the First State. So proud of @SarahEMcBride for making more history in Delaware! Our state will be better with your voice and your vote in Dover. https://t.co/Q5HmCQTa2p

.@LisaBRochester may have worked for me once but the truth is that I’ve been lucky to learn from and work with her.   I couldn’t be prouder that she will continue serving the people of Delaware with the courage and conviction that I’ve gotten to see up close for decades. https://t.co/Ga4PN9aEyj
This is what democracy looks (and sounds) like. https://t.co/fTGgWYRLhS

It’s a given that every state has two senators. But not every senator gets to serve with a true partner.   Congratulations to my wingman in the Senate @ChrisCoonsforDE on a well-deserved and convincing win. Can’t wait to get back to work with you! https://t.co/1ItGYAJ0te

As we navigate these unprecedented times there’s no one I’d rather have guiding our team in Delaware than @JohnCarneyDe.   We in the First State are lucky to have a governor lead by compassion and conviction. Congratulations on your big win! https://t.co/oj0J7M5aKp

Congratulations to all of the amazing Democrats who won up and down our state yesterday! Thanks to each and every one of you for being a part of this democratic process and making history. We're so excited for your leadership here in the First State! https://t.co/YpWC8kwcXo
Keep the faith and count the votes!
The sun is shining and people are energized in the First State. It’s a beautiful day for Delaware to #FlipThe5th.   Let’s go @KyleEvansGay! https://t.co/KGOY8EniZM

When it comes to first-rate leaders it’s an embarrassment of riches here in First State!  Martha and I are so proud to have leaders like @JoeBiden @johncarneyforde @ChrisCoonsforDE @LisaBRochester representing the very best of Delaware. Let’s win big tonight! https://t.co/W1ceZ8W3PI
Let’s make history tonight! Proud to stand with you all in this fight for a better brighter future for all Delawareans. https://t.co/7MENBkdMSX
It’s a great day to elect @JoeBiden!  Polls in Delaware open at 7 AM. Mask up. Go #vote. And let’s win. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/sopb5JMzNC

Before almost every one I’ve heard @JoeBiden say “This is the most important election of our life.” Each time he knows even more is at stake for future generations.   Tomorrow is the most important election of our life. Let’s elect someone worthy of the job. #MyElectionMoment https://t.co/AQHhDHNsEQ
Tomorrow let’s fire Donald Trump and elect a President who will listen to Dr. Fauci. #BidenHarris2020 #VOTE https://t.co/rJfwNzEEAX
Absolutely no regard for endangering American lives.   Once again the only people that Donald Trump and Mike Pence care about are: Donald Trump and Mike Pence. https://t.co/TBQpJUvSJ2
Turn your anger into action and vote on November 3rd. We need @JoeBiden in the White House now more than ever.  #VoteBlue  https://t.co/wTd6uLIpQ8

After refusing to protect Americans during a global pandemic the Senate Republicans have jammed through yet another controversial Supreme Court Justice while an election is underway. The American people deserve better.
If you’re angry right now make your voice heard and #VoteThemOut https://t.co/xBi5FQcWsz

One year ago today @JoeBiden was worried that we weren’t prepared for a pandemic.   Today we’ve lost 225000 Americans. And the Trump Administration admits that they’re “not going to control the virus.”  Leadership matters. And we need it.  9 days. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/nBgNGNLa5u

‘Carpe Diem’ means ‘Seize the Day!’ (Although in Delaware we like to say ‘Carper Diem!‘)  With just 10 days to go there’s no better time to drop off that ballot and make sure your #vote is counted! #EarlyVoteDay  https://t.co/wTd6uLIpQ8

I’ve known @JoeBiden for decades. But the wonderful thing about Joe is that don’t have to meet him to know that he has the heart the character and the compassion to be a leader for ALL Americans.   I can’t wait to call him our President.   12 days. Let’s win. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/7OkopOdfHu

While we're on the subject of fumes let’s not forget that Trump's EPA has been rolling back critical protections for clean air throughout this deadly respiratory pandemic.  These rollbacks will lead to more harmful pollution and thousands of more deaths. https://t.co/6IKlLaUigM

The Trump Administration has orphaned over 500 children. Not by accident. It was the very point of the policy. https://t.co/8uT2sWE43z

Wouldn’t it be nice to have a President who cares more about other Americans than himself? #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/hL3QF2D89g

We’re 19 days away from the election.  I want a president who will ensure the best future for our country and our planet. After the last four years we know what is at stake and can't afford to have anyone sit this one out. Make a voting plan today: https://t.co/O8pDj7CHP4

.@KamalaHarris knocked it out of the park tonight.   We have 27 days left. Let’s finish strong — together. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/J3boYTHECL

Let’s be perfectly clear. I have no problem with Amy Coney Barrett’s Catholic faith. After all I can hardly wait to make a Catholic our next President.  What DOES concern me is her belief that the Affordable Care Act should be struck down in the middle of a deadly pandemic.

I know that many mothers and grandmothers may not be able to be with their families in person today. But even if it’s from afar I hope you’re celebrated and know how much we appreciate all you’re doing. Happy Mother's Day to all!

A big thank you to the mothers who are working on the front lines of this crisis -- the doctors nurses first responders grocery store clerks farmers food producers and so many more. Thank you for all that you're doing for your own family — and for our families — every day.

Wishing an especially happy #MothersDay to all the mothers and strong women doing even more for their families these days. So many are working from home while also being full time teachers chefs and entertainers. Your love and support is what’s helping so many during this time.

Due to the challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic we're not able to enjoy this #EarthDay together like we normally would. But I believe we can – and we should – still celebrate this special day together while practicing safe social distancing.

I celebrated my first #EarthDay in 1970 our country’s first-ever Earth Day. That day was transformative for me and it’s served as an inspiration ever since. We have made important progress over the last 50 years to clean our air and water but we still have a lot of work to do.
